text: William Alvin Moody (April 10, 1954 â€“ March 5, 2013) better known by his ring name Paul Bearer as well as Percival Pringle III, was an American professional wrestling manager and professional wrestler. He was best known for managing both The Undertaker as well as his on-screen brother, Kane in the WWF/WWE. Moody was born on 10 April 1954 in Mobile, Alabama. He died on 5 March 2013 in Mobile, Alabama from a heart attack. Club board member of Cauliflower Alley Club "Cowboy" Bob Kelly said that during a reunion on 2 March, Moody was having trouble breathing and was also coughing. Moody said that he was going to be treated for respiratory problems and Kelly said that Moody was treated for a blood clot after the reunion. ==References== ==Other websites== *Paul Bearer at WWE.com Category:1954 births Category:2013 deaths Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Deaths from blood clot Category:Professional wrestling managers and valets Category:Sportspeople from Mobile, Alabama Category:WWE Hall of Fame
title: Paul Bearer
